datas.title: Blog
datas.description: A little blog about programming, more for practicing than for posting. The main feature of this project is the tag filter

datas.title: E-commerce
datas.description: Conceived in just 48 hours during a coding rush at Ã‰cole 42, this PHP e-commerce website exemplifies effective time management and practical development skills. Equipped with basic functionalities like user registration, login, and logout, the site employs a Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture. Despite the time constraints and lack of frameworks, the website provides a basic but functional e-commerce solution.

datas.title: Pomodoro
datas.description: Just a little timer like pomodoro.

datas.title: Mobile App's
datas.description: 6 littles app's with the framework flutter. Many subjects were dealt with, including how to set up a Provider, audio player, video player, fetching datas, geolocating, and some other stuff
